languages.text: Кассия Орселлио отринула предначертанную ей судьбу Новатора и решила прожить отведенное ей время подле возлюбленного. Она прожила недолгую, но счастливую жизнь подле своего избранника, стараясь наполнять каждый миг, проведенный вместе, любовью и яркими красками. Увы, генетические мутации не позволяли Кассии завести наследника, а вскоре и начали гротескно искажать ее тело. Однажды, подарив любимому поцелуй перед сном, Кассия исчезла, оставив на прощание короткую записку: "Любовь моя, с первой встречи и до последних дней ты оставался единственным сиянием рассветного солнца в моем сердце, что никогда не угасало. Твоя жизнь еще впереди — проживи ее счастливо за нас обоих. А я… я бесконечно люблю тебя. Твоя Касс".

Cassia Orsellio renounced her destiny of becoming the Novator and chose to spend her days with her beloved. She lived a short life, trying to fill every moment spent together with colour and passion. Alas, Cassia's genetic mutations did not allow her to bear an heir, and soon they began grotesquely deforming her body. One night, she gave her lover a kiss and disappeared forever, leaving behind a short note: "My love, from our first meeting to our final days together, you were the only morning light that shone in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. As for me... I love you endlessly. Yours, Cass."
languages.original_text: Кассия Орселлио отринула предначертанную ей судьбу Новатора и решила прожить отведенное ей время подле возлюбленного. Она прожила недолгую, но счастливую жизнь подле своего избранника, стараясь наполнять каждый миг, проведенный вместе, любовью и яркими красками. Однажды, подарив любимому поцелуй перед сном, Кассия исчезла, оставив на прощание короткую записку: "Любовь моя, с первой встречи и до последних дней ты оставался единственным сиянием рассветного солнца в моем сердце, что никогда не угасало. Твоя жизнь еще впереди — проживи ее счастливо за нас обоих. А я… я бесконечно люблю тебя. Твоя Касс".

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio gave up her destiny to become a Novator and decided to spend the time allotted to her with her lover. She lived a short, but happy life with her darling, trying to fill every moment they spent together with colour and love. Sadly, genetic mutations did not allow Cassia to have an heir, and soon they started to cause grotesque deformations over her body. One day she gave her lover an evening kiss and disappeared, leaving behind a note. It said: "My love, from the first time I met you, and til the last days, you were the only morning light that shined in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. And I... I love you, so, so much. Yours, Cass."

It said: "My love, from the first time I met you, and til the last days, you were the only morning light that shined in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. And I... I love you, so, so much. Yours, Cass."

Sadly, Cassia's genetic mutations did not allow her to bear an heir, and soon they began grotesquely deforming her body. One day, she gave her lover a kiss goodnight and disappeared forever, leaving behind a short note: "My love, from our first meeting to our final days together, you were the only morning light that shined in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. As for me... I love you endlessly. Yours, Cass."

languages.text: 卡西娅·奥赛罗放弃了成为大族长的命运，决定与她的爱人度过余下的岁月。她与爱人度过了短暂的时光，努力让共度的每一刻都充满色彩与激情。然而遗憾的是，由于卡西娅的基因突变，她无法生育后代，而她的身体也很快发生了畸变。某天晚上，她给了她的爱人一个吻，之后就彻底消失了，只留下了一张简短的纸条，上面写着:“我的爱人，从我们的初见到我们最后共度的日子，你始终都是我心中唯一的曙光，从未褪色。你还有很长的路要走，所以，请为了我们俩，快乐地活下去吧。至于我……我永远爱你。你亲爱的，阿娅。”
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio renounced her destiny of becoming the Novator and chose to spend her days with her beloved. She lived a short life, trying to fill every moment spent together with colour and passion. Alas, Cassia's genetic mutations did not allow her to bear an heir, and soon they began grotesquely deforming her body. One night, she gave her lover a kiss and disappeared forever, leaving behind a short note: "My love, from our first meeting to our final days together, you were the only morning light that shone in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. As for me... I love you endlessly. Yours, Cass."

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅·奥塞罗放弃了成为大族长的命运，决定与她的爱人度过余下的时光。她与爱人度过了短暂而幸福的生活，努力让他们共度的每一刻都充满光明与爱。然而，令人悲伤的是，由于卡西娅的基因突变，她无法生育后代，而她的身体也很快发生了畸变。某天晚上，她给了她的爱人一个晚安吻，之后就彻底消失了，只留下了一张简短的纸条，上面写着:“我的爱人，从我们的初见到我们最后共度的日子，你始终都是我心中唯一的曙光，从未褪色。你还有很长的路要走，所以，请为了我们俩，快乐地活下去吧。至于我……我永远爱你。你亲爱的，阿娅。”

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio gab ihre Bestimmung auf, zur Novatorin zu werden. Sie entschied, ihr Leben mit {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Geliebten zu verbringen. Sie führte ein kurzes, aber glückliches Leben mit ihrer großen Liebe. Die zwei versuchten, jeden gemeinsamen Augenblick mit Farbe und Liebe zu füllen. Leider gestattete Cassias genetische Mutation ihr nicht, einen Erben zu gebären, und begann bald, ihren Körper auf groteske Weise zu verformen. Eines Tages gab sie {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Geliebten einen Kuss und verschwand für immer. Sie hinterließ nur eine kurze Nachricht: "Mein Herz, von unserer ersten Begegnung bis zu unseren letzten gemeinsamen Tagen wart Ihr das einzige Morgenlicht, das je in mein Herz geschienen ist, niemals seid Ihr verblasst. Ihr habt ein Leben vor Euch — lebt glücklich, für uns beide. Was mich angeht ... Ich liebe Euch endlos. Für immer, Cass."
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio renounced her destiny of becoming the Novator and chose to spend her days with her beloved. She lived a short life, trying to fill every moment spent together with colour and passion. Alas, Cassia's genetic mutations did not allow her to bear an heir, and soon they began grotesquely deforming her body. One night, she gave her lover a kiss and disappeared forever, leaving behind a short note: "My love, from our first meeting to our final days together, you were the only morning light that shone in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. As for me... I love you endlessly. Yours, Cass."

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio gab ihre Bestimmung auf, zur Novatorin zu werden. Sie entschied, ihr Leben mit {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Geliebten zu verbringen. Sie führte ein kurzes, aber glückliches Leben mit ihrer großen Liebe. Die zwei versuchten, jeden gemeinsamen Augenblick mit Farbe und Liebe zu füllen. Leider gestattete Cassias genetische Mutation ihr nicht, einen Erben zu gebären, und begann bald, ihren Körper auf groteske Weise zu verformen. Eines Tages gab sie {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Geliebten einen Gutenachtkuss und verschwand für immer. Sie hinterließ nur eine kurze Nachricht: "Mein Herz, von unserer ersten Begegnung bis zu unseren letzten gemeinsamen Tagen wart Ihr das einzige Morgenlicht, das je in mein Herz geschienen ist, niemals seid Ihr verblasst. Ihr habt ein Leben vor Euch — lebt glücklich, für uns beide. Was mich angeht ... Ich liebe Euch endlos. Für immer, Cass."

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio renonça à son destin de Novator pour vivre pleinement sa relation amoureuse. Sa vie fut courte, mais heureuse, et le couple fit de son mieux pour remplir chaque moment d'amour et de joie. Hélas, les mutations génétiques de Cassia ne lui permirent pas de porter un héritier et finirent par provoquer d'atroces déformations de son corps. Puis vint la nuit où elle embrassa l'objet de son affection avant de disparaître à jamais en laissant derrière elle un court message : « Mon amour, tu as été la seule lumière qui a illuminé mon cœur sans jamais faiblir depuis notre première rencontre jusqu'à nos derniers jours ensemble. Tu as toute la vie devant toi... Savoure-la pour nous deux. Quant à moi... je t'aimerai éternellement. Cass. »
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio renounced her destiny of becoming the Novator and chose to spend her days with her beloved. She lived a short life, trying to fill every moment spent together with colour and passion. Alas, Cassia's genetic mutations did not allow her to bear an heir, and soon they began grotesquely deforming her body. One night, she gave her lover a kiss and disappeared forever, leaving behind a short note: "My love, from our first meeting to our final days together, you were the only morning light that shone in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. As for me... I love you endlessly. Yours, Cass."

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio renonça à son destin de Novator pour vivre pleinement sa relation amoureuse. Sa vie fut courte, mais heureuse, et le couple tenta de remplir chaque moment d'amour et de joie. Hélas, les mutations génétiques de Cassia ne lui permirent pas de porter un héritier et finirent par provoquer d'atroces déformations de son corps. Vint le jour où elle embrassa l'objet de son affection avant de disparaître nuitamment en laissant derrière elle un court message : « Mon amour, tu as été la seule lumière qui a illuminé mon cœur sans jamais faiblir depuis notre première rencontre jusqu'à nos derniers jours ensemble. Tu as toute la vie devant toi... Savoure-la pour nous deux. Quant à moi... je t'aimerai éternellement. Cass. »

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio renunció a su destino de convertirse en la Novator para pasar sus días con su amado. La suya fue una vida breve, pero trató de llenar de color y pasión cada momento que pasó con él. Por desgracia, las mutaciones genéticas de Cassia no le permitían tener descendencia, y pronto comenzaron a deformar su cuerpo de forma grotesca. Una noche, dio un beso de despedida a su pareja y desapareció para siempre, dejando detrás tan solo una nota: «Amor mío, desde nuestro primer encuentro a nuestros últimos días juntos has sido la única luz que ha brillado en mi corazón, esperanzadora e inmutable. Te espera una larga vida: disfrútala felizmente por los dos. En cuanto a mí... nunca dejaré de quererte. Siempre tuya, Cass».
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio renounced her destiny of becoming the Novator and chose to spend her days with her beloved. She lived a short life, trying to fill every moment spent together with colour and passion. Alas, Cassia's genetic mutations did not allow her to bear an heir, and soon they began grotesquely deforming her body. One night, she gave her lover a kiss and disappeared forever, leaving behind a short note: "My love, from our first meeting to our final days together, you were the only morning light that shone in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. As for me... I love you endlessly. Yours, Cass."

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio abandonó su destino de convertirse en Novator para pasar sus días con su pareja. La suya fue una vida breve pero feliz junto a su amado, y trataron de llenar cada momento que pasaron juntos de color y amor. Por desgracia, las mutaciones genéticas de Cassia no le permitían tener descendencia, y pronto comenzaron a deformar su cuerpo de forma grotesca. Un día, dio un beso de buenas noches a su pareja y desapareció para siempre, dejando detrás tan solo una nota: «Amor mío, desde nuestro primer encuentro a nuestros últimos días juntos has sido la única luz que ha brillado en mi corazón, esperanzadora e inmutable. Te espera una larga vida: disfrútala felizmente por los dos. En cuanto a mí... nunca dejaré de quererte. Siempre tuya, Cass».

languages.text: カシア・オーセリオはノベイターとなる定めを放棄して、愛する人と過ごせる日々を選択した。彼女は短い人生を、共に過ごす一瞬一瞬を色彩と情熱で満たそうとして生きた。しかし、カカッシアの遺伝子変異は彼女に世継ぎを産ませることを許さず、やがてその肉体は醜い異形へと変化させていった。ある夜、彼女は恋人に口づけを残し、永遠に姿を消した。残されたメモにはこう記されていた。「愛しい人。初めの出会いから共に過ごした最後の時まで、あなたはあたくしの心に降り注ぐ、いつまでも消えることのない、ただひとつの朝の光でした。あなたにはあなたの人生があります。二人のためにも、どうか幸せに生きてください。あたくしは…いつまでもあなたを愛しています。カシアより」
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio renounced her destiny of becoming the Novator and chose to spend her days with her beloved. She lived a short life, trying to fill every moment spent together with colour and passion. Alas, Cassia's genetic mutations did not allow her to bear an heir, and soon they began grotesquely deforming her body. One night, she gave her lover a kiss and disappeared forever, leaving behind a short note: "My love, from our first meeting to our final days together, you were the only morning light that shone in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. As for me... I love you endlessly. Yours, Cass."

traits.locale_text: カシア・オーセリオはノベイターとなる定めを放棄して、愛する人と過ごせる日々を選択した。彼女は短い人生を、共に過ごす一瞬一瞬を色彩と情熱で満たそうとして生きた。しかし、カカッシアの遺伝子変異は彼女に世継ぎを産ませることを許さず、やがてその肉体は醜い異形へと変化させていった。ある夜、彼女は恋人に口づけを残し、永遠に姿を消した。残されたメモにはこう記されていた。「愛しい人。初めの出会いから共に過ごした最後の時まで、あなたはあたくしの心に降り注ぐ、いつまでも消えることのない、ただひとつの朝の光でした。あなたにはあなたの人生があります。二人のためにも、どうか幸せに生きてください。あたくしは…いつまでもあなたを愛しています。カシアより」

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio, Rota Reisi olma yazgısını reddedip hayatını sevdiğiyle birlikte geçirmeyi seçti. Her bir anını renklerle ve tutkuyla doldurduğu, kısa bir hayat yaşadı. Ne yazık ki Cassia'nın genetik mutasyonları, dünyaya bir vâris getirmesine müsaade etmedi ve kısa süre sonra bedeninde grotesk deformasyonlar oluşmasına neden oldu. Bir gece âşığına bir öpücük verdi ve bir daha görülmemek üzere ortadan kayboldu. Arkasında kısa bir not bıraktı: "Aşkım, ilk karşılaştığımız andan birlikte geçirdiğimiz son günlere kadar kalbime ışıldayan, asla sönmeyen biricik seher ışığımdın. Önünde uzun bir hayat var. Her ikimiz için de onu mutlulukla doldurarak yaşa. Sana sonsuz bir sevgi besliyorum. İmza: Cass."
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio renounced her destiny of becoming the Novator and chose to spend her days with her beloved. She lived a short life, trying to fill every moment spent together with colour and passion. Alas, Cassia's genetic mutations did not allow her to bear an heir, and soon they began grotesquely deforming her body. One night, she gave her lover a kiss and disappeared forever, leaving behind a short note: "My love, from our first meeting to our final days together, you were the only morning light that shone in my heart, never fading. You have a life ahead of you — live it happily, for both of us. As for me... I love you endlessly. Yours, Cass."

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio, Rota Reisi olma yazgısını reddetti ve yaşamın sevdiğiyle birlikte geçirmeyi seçti. Her bir anı renklerle ve tutkuyla doldurduğu, kısa bir hayat yaşadı. Ne yazık ki Cassia'nın genetik mutasyonları, bir vâris dünyaya getirmesine izin vermedi ve kısa süre sonra bedeninde grotesk deformasyonlar oluşmasına neden oldu. Bir gece âşığına bir öpücük verdi ve bir daha görülmemek üzere ortadan kayboldu. Arkasında kısa bir not bıraktı: "Aşkım, ilk karşılaştığımız andan birlikte geçirdiğimiz son günlere kadar kalbime ışıldayan, asla sönmeyen tek seher ışığı sendin. Önünde uzun bir yaşam var: Her ikimiz için de onu mutluluklarla doldurarak yaşa. Ve ben, seni sınırsızca seviyorum. İmza: Cass."
